title: @Riot  --   What the hell is going on???
body:
Yo, Rito, what are you doing?  A bazillion people just got perma slapped for third party usage today, and that is only from what I see on boards while being at work... Most likely hundreds if not thousands more are out there not knowing what hit them. So what in God's name is going on?

I just want to confirm if there was a legit mass ban wave, or if its a bug in your system since alot of people are talking of fishy emails and whatnot.

can any red confirm?

replies.body:
So, a relatively large percentage of the most recent scripting banwave inaccurately targeted previous mkjogo users (a skinhacking application).  It was definitely a bug, and we never planned to issue permanent suspensions for this type of abuse.  ** As of this post, all affected players have been unbanned. **

Always practice caution in choosing to use client modifications.  While we're not permanently suspending for mkjogo today, we're obviously not ever going to condone any "skinhacking" service.

I never used any third party programs and I was recently perma-banned, mine was not overturned as if this post.

I sent a support ticket and it has not been addressed... I have not been punished in several YEARS so to go from nothing to instant perma-ban is very disconcerting. I hope this was also a mistake .... but there is complete silence from Riot's part. My ticket hasn't even been responded to. I initially thought my account had been hacked or something but apparently not.

I think it was because of toxicity which would be fine but I didn't even get chat logs or warnings... I had an account banned for toxicity in S2 (4-5 years ago) and I had LOTS of warnings and punishments prior to being perma-banned.... this time it came straight out of nowhere, the email I got doesn't explain it and when I try to log on, it just says;

>This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details.
Looks like your suspension is due to behavior, not 3rd party applications.  This is something that'd be better handled in your ticket, so I'd definitely encourage patience in waiting for a response.

Though I would think I'd get a chat restriction or even a 14 day suspension rather than straight up perma-ban bypassing all tiers, is my point.... and shouldn't I have gotten a chat log and an explanation in an email? I was given nothing, no information whatsoever. This is very different than when I had an account banned in early S2 when I got many warnings, punishments and the support team immediately explained exactly what was going on. Right now I have no idea what's going on and am very slowly being given partial details.

What's up with that? I'm not asking to be absolved , I just want some information as to why I was randomly bypassed to all punishment tiers into perma with zero information compared to how it happened before.
Do you use any derogatory terms. Like racism, homophobia or other hate speech. Also, Dominick decoco.

If he did he'd have to have some seriously bad logs to go all the way to a perma.

Even the use of "retard" as an insult wont get you punished provided you dont do it frequently
